name: Google Auth2
desc: Google APIs (or Google AJAX APIs) is a set of JavaScript APIs developed by Google that allows interaction with Google Services and integration of rich, multimedia, search or feed-based Internet content into web applications. They extensively use AJAX scripting and can be easily loaded using Google Loader.

values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/freebase: Sign in to Freebase with your account
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/analytic: View and manage your Google Analytics data
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtubep: View and manage your assets and associated content on YouTube
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.me: View metadata for files and documents in your Google Drive
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.fi: View and manage Google Drive files that you have opened or created with this app
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo: View basic information about your account
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/yt-analy: View YouTube Analytics monetary reports for your YouTube content
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/plus.me: Know who you are on Google
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive: View and manage the files and documents in your Google Drive
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/devstora: Manage your data and permissions in Google Cloud Storage
View your data in Google Cloud Storage
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/adexchan: View and manage your Ad Exchange data
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/apps.gro: View and manage the settings of a Google Apps Group
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/apps.lic: Read/write access to License Manager API.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/bigquery: View and manage your data in Google BigQuery
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloudpri: View and manage your google cloud print data
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/coordina: View and manage your Google Maps Coordinate jobs
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.re: View the files and documents in your Google Drive
View your Google Compute Engine resources
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/siteveri: Manage the list of sites and domains you control
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/yt-analy: View YouTube Analytics reports for your YouTube content
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/devstora: Manage your data in Google Cloud Storage
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/compute: View and manage your Google Compute Engine resources
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/adsense: View and manage your AdSense data
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/latitude: Manage your best-available location and location history
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/dfarepor: View and manage DoubleClick for Advertisers reports
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/adsenseh: View and manage your AdSense host data and associated accounts
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/predicti: Manage your data in the Google Prediction API
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/siteveri: Manage your new site verifications with Google
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/latitude: Manage your city-level location and location history
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/plus.log: Know your name, basic info, and list of people you're connected to on Google+
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.sc: Modify your Google Apps Script scripts' behavior
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/adexchan: Manage your Ad Exchange buyer account configuration
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.in: Special scope used to let users approve installation of an app
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.ap: Allows access to the Application Data folder
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/tracks: Google Maps Tracks API, This scope allows read and write access to your project's data.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/mapsengi: provides read and write access to the user's Maps Engine data from your application.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/androidp: Access to the Google Play Android Developer
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/games: Scope for accessing data from Google Play Games.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/appstate: Scope for using the App State service.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/mapsengi: provides read-only access to the user's Maps Engine data from your
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/structur: Read/write access to Shopping Content API.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/apps/rep: Access to the Admin Audit API ReadOnly
values.https://apps-apis.google.com/a/feeds/pol: Use this scope for OAuth access to the customerId operation
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/bigquery: View your data in Google BigQuery
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/apps.ord: For reseller administrators and users read/write access when testing in the API's sandbox, or read/write access when calling an API operation directly.
In addition to the overall read/write OAuth scope, use the read only OAuth scope when retrieving the customer's data.
values.https://www.google.com/m8/feeds: read/write access to Contacts and Contact Groups
values.https://docs.google.com/feeds/: Access to all Document List feeds. Google Documents List API has been officially deprecated as of September 14, 2012. It will continue to work as per our deprecation policy, but we encourage you to move to the Google Drive API.
values.https://docs.googleusercontent.com/: Google docs. Google Documents List API has been officially deprecated as of September 14, 2012. It will continue to work as per our deprecation policy, but we encourage you to move to the Google Drive API.
values.https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/: Google docs. Google Documents List API has been officially deprecated as of September 14, 2012. It will continue to work as per our deprecation policy, but we encourage you to move to the Google Drive API.
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/apps.gro: Read and write access to Groups Migration API.
values.https://mail.google.com/: The scope for IMAP and SMTP access
values.email: Get access to your mail. The presence of email requests that the ID Token include email and email_verified claims, and that these values be included in the information available at the userinfo endpoint.
values.profile: Get access to your profile. profile will provide an Access Token that can be used to obtain user profile information from the Userinfo endpoint. We recommend using Google+ Sign-In if your application needs user profile information because the Google+ APIs provide a richer set of data that can be controlled by the user

values.offline: /!\ Please use server-side only /!\ If your application needs to refresh access tokens when the user is not present at the browser
